thai.title: Traditional Thai Massage
thai.description: A therapeutic massage that combines acupressure, Indian Ayurvedic principles, and assisted yoga postures. Perfect for relieving muscle tension and improving flexibility.

oil.title: Oil Massage
oil.description: A gentle and relaxing massage using aromatic oils to soothe the body and mind. Improves circulation and relieves stress.

foot.title: Foot Reflexology
foot.description: Based on the principle that reflex points on the feet correspond to organs and glands in the body. Promotes overall health and well-being.

Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.q1: What is the difference between Oil and Thai Massage?
Faq.a1: Thai Massage is performed fully clothed on a floor mat and involves stretching and pressure points. Oil Massage is performed on a table with skin contact using aromatic oils for relaxation.
Faq.q2: Does Thai Massage help with back pain?
Faq.a2: Yes, targeted stretching and acupressure in Thai Massage are highly effective for relieving back tension and improving mobility.
Faq.q3: Is Nuad Thai covered by insurance?
Faq.a3: Please check with your supplementary health insurance provider. While we are certified, coverage policies vary.
Faq.a4: For Thai Massage, we provide comfortable traditional clothing. For Oil Massage, standard draping procedures are used to ensure your privacy and comfort.
